about_the_game:
Inspired by the classic Windows 7 image viewer but with a modern design and new features, RGByte Image Viewer is designed as an alternative to the default image viewer of your operating system. Browse your images efficiently and enjoy key features within a cohesive interface.

Available features:

  • Enhanced zoom.

  • Free image movement.

  • View native image pixels (disabling the HD function).

  • Supports JPG, PNG, BMP, GIF, WEBP, and SVG files (default format).

  • Allows changing the background color, ideal for images with transparency.

  • Displays the file name and/or path in the title bar.

  • Navigate through all images in the same folder when opening one.

  • Switch between multiple available themes.

  • Low disk space and RAM usage.

name: RGByte Image Viewer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: This will be your new favorite image viewer: lightweight, fast, and practical.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Bulgarian, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Danish, Spanish - Latin America, Finnish, Greek, Dutch, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Romanian, Russian, Swedish, Thai, Czech, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Arabic
